name: Final Frontier: Veronica Station Demo
description:
DESCRIPTION

FINAL FRONTIER: Veronica Station is a short ambient adventure of the a corvette class Federation Cruiser on a mission to reach a secluded research base  - Veronica Station. Having suffered an unexpected malfunction the ship Ishmael 2 and it's crew lead by Captain Daniel Reeds are forced to make the best of their situation in order to keep the ship operation just as long as they can reach their destination. 

PERSONAL NOTE

The game in itself is my very first attempt at creating a full gaming experience, rather than a short mini-game. It is also a result of my 3 month learning curve with Unity and Blender. The game  is in no way perfect, as I still have much to learn, but it can be entertaining if you give it a try. 

FREE TO PLAY 

The game is obviously free to play, but I did leave the donate option on, just on the off chance that you really liked the concept and are interested in future developments. 

DISCLAIMER

The game is not commercial product, but a publicly free-to-play demo shared to showcase the various basic gaming and storytelling mechanics, that are possible to achieve in a home made production using the Unity engine. 

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS

Windows 7, Intel Core i7 2.4GHz
8GB RAM, Free Disk Space 333 MB
